original_text: And we are sending along with him the brother who is praised by all the churches for his service to the gospel.
korean_text: 또 그와 함께 그 형제를 보내었으니 이 사람은 복음으로써 모든 교회에서 칭찬을 받는 자요

sentences.original_text: And we are sending along with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 그와 함께 보내고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: the brother who is praised by all the churches
for his service to the gospel
